title: I was banned for feeding
body:
first i would like ot say this acount has never been so much as chat restricted... i have never gotten seasion reowrds in my life.. i am refourmed i never fight i never call names im very supportive... but i dont know how to play irvin I had to panic pick and the I did my best.. despite being called "trash" and such names through the game i kept a calm head.. how does riot treat this they ban me for feeding... i was not running it down mid and i just being invaded a lot...

this is not fair.. i was honer three i was doing so good.. they wont even tell me why im banned they said "it would make it where you can feed more without getting cought. i had a bad game.. and now my honer is gone..  and im banned for doing nothing wrong but being bad at the game.. will post chat below 




Avatar
Blitzcrank Bot
Today at 00:01
Greetings, human! I am Blitzcrank Bot. My purpose is to provide a fast and thorough explanation of your recent ban.

Players have reported you 22 times in the past 20 games for intentional feeding. It is, to borrow a human phrase, a “not cool,” and may result in a permaban the next time it occurs.

Intentional feeding is an inefficient way to punish your teammates. If you are angry with them or want to give up during a hopeless match, /mute all and focus on something else - try to kill the enemy ADC as many times as possible; practice CSing or a weird buildpath. If you hate your team, focus on carrying them so hard it destroys their self-confidence.

I hope I have been useful to you. Although my heart is cold and mechanical, I feel we now have a deep connection and bond. There isn’t much more information a human specialist could provide, but if you want any further questions answered, you may select the option below.

Request a human

Avatar
Mythic Angol
Today at 00:10
This was my first game a irvon I typed nothing bad yet i was flamed the whole time... i did nothing bad.. the only crime iv comited is being bad a ivrin... I sold all my items at the end I did have a build.. I just wasent very good.. I am honer 3 I would like my honer 3 back and my bad lifted... I am sorry i did bad but it was not intentional... first time as him.. i normaly play yi

Avatar
Mythic Angol
Today at 00:13
and forither more I did not intentionaly feed.. I try to go for kills.. im just bad at the game... I have done nothing wrong

Avatar
Mythic Angol
Today at 12:47
Also I know I was afk for a short time my monther had me do somthing... i really dont feel this is fair i used to be used toix now i just talk freindly .... iv done good and worked hard to earn that honer 3... this is just unfair...

Avatar
Mumbino
Today at 18:39
Hey there,

Mumbino here from Player Support.

I totally understand your frustration. It sucks to have an account suspended. After reviewing your game though, I can see instances where this was more than just a "bad game", and feel that this suspension was placed fairly.

Your account received a 2-week suspension because you were intentionally feeding/griefing in your recent game. Intentionally Feeding/Griefing creates a negative experience for those 9 other players in the game. They are trying to have a fair, competitive, and sportsmanlike game. But by intentionally feeding/griefing takes that away from them and we don't want to encourage that.

Just to let you know, when receiving a 2-week suspension; it is our way of giving the player a final warning. If you receive another intentional feeding suspension the account will be auto-escalated to a permaban. But if you want to avoid that, you can heal from your penalty by playing to your best ability with a neutral-positive mindset.

Again, I know it sucks to have your account get suspended. In the future, I would recommend just playing out the game to the best of your ability to protect yourself from getting penalized like this.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with.

Mumbino
Riot Games Player Support
Ahri Main
"Don't you trust me?"

Avatar
Mythic Angol
Today at 18:46
Your breaking you own rules.. I have not been chat restricted once... I was playing a new champ I never played before i dident understand how to collect jg camps and i was being flames the whole time.. I am a honerable play and respect my team mates... but its hard to do when they just keep calling you names
even harder when bot fed dravin I am sorry I played bad but i was not trolling i have never trolling.. I just bught ivrin a few days ago wantes to try and and dident understand how he cant attk jg mods... I am honerable.. I do my best to stay possaitve... I am sorry i played that bad but i dident know what to do his way a jging is hard to understand at first...

Avatar
Mythic Angol
Today at 18:52
I know I did bad but it was because of not having the knowlige of the champs... in no way was it intentional

Avatar
Mythic Angol
Today at 18:54
Everyone in the gane was feeding hard. Only one with kills was yi, this is my first game i ever played on ivern and theres was nothing i could do against a fed powerhouse like draven.

I have played multiple games with feeders who never get it trouble, and i have only ONE bad gane on a champ i am still LEARNING and you guys ban me

I am honor 3 and have been nice and honroable for the entire season and you guys took it away from me over one single game. I didnt mean to do so poorly and want to ask if i can get this revoked based on my current honor and the fact that everyone in the game did bad.

Avatar
Mythic Angol
Today at 18:58
There are people who intentionally feed ober 50 killa a game abd they still end up on my game and there are youtube videos of people doing it for hundreds. I am a honrobale reformed player and this is unfair what you guys are doing for me, i wont even get ranked rewarda now because of one mistake in a game. Also i was late to the game because of irl issues. So at that point i was screwes.

Avatar
Mumbino
Today at 21:53
I know this really sucks and I do apologize for this, but I cannot discuss details regarding our investigation that goes into Intentional feeding cases, because players like to use that information to try and circumvent our system to try and prevent from getting caught in the future. But I do feel that the suspension was placed fairly and this does seem more than just "a bad game".

Again, I'm very sorry about this and I truly wish there was more info I could give here. Please feel free to write back if you got any more questions or concerns you would like to discuss.

Mumbino
Riot Games Player Support
Ahri Main
"Don't you trust me?"

Avatar
Mythic Angol
Today at 22:26
You dont care i havent been toxic for 6 monts.. i got honer 3 i was gonna get rewords the first time in my life.. my whole team fed it wasent just me.. it was a loss... you dont treat your players what respect what so ever.. i did nothing wrong it was my first time playing her.. i had no idea that you had to prep camps... this is unfair

replies.body: I usually give advice and direction, but you can't buy *only* Mobi boots and use Ghost to get 0/18/0 with 2 CS and expect to get away with intentionally feeding. Sorry, just play the game as intended and don't try to ruin the game for others.

>Sorry, just play the game as intended and don't try to ruin the game for others.

You ended up giving advice anyway :)

> one game no matter how bad should never get you banned

People who intentionally feed have no place in this game. 17 times a week we have to hear the ragebabies here cry, "RITO I GOT BANNED FOR CHAT BUT YOU NEVER PUNISH INTERS." They absolutely do, and you're the proof.

> I was banned for feeding

**GOOD**.

https://youtu.be/9nJZ3J0i7vY

The video speaks for itself.

As an aside, you weren't DC'ed long enough to not gain LP. You came back quickly enough that you would have gained LP had your team won.
I had to do somthing in real life that was importent before the game.. real life is always more immportent

Yeah if it was so important, then leave the game, your teammates can remake and you wouldn't have gotten your 2 week vacation. And no you cannot get leaverbusted for leaving one game, its like 15+ games. But you chose to feed.

~~I get the frustration with feeders, but I feel like your point would be stronger with out the last word.~~

Nicely said
this 2 weeks u have all the time irl
this video alone should perma ban him. but riot wont do much . pfft

You say you got invaded a lot, but not a single death was in the jungle. All of your deaths were either in mid lane, or in your base. You got 2 cs. TWO. You sold all your items. You went afk. And did I read that right, that it was a ranked game? (I forget and dont feel like going back to your match history to re check)

You're busted. So glad to see Riot banning players like you.
this is my first punishment on this acount... it was a loss no mater what i did and like i said i did not understand irvin at all ...

tbh..your actually wrongly punished.
it should be permanent banned. Most of your games are more than 10death and taking smites when ur not jg?

> [{quoted}](name=nadekohecate,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=vLF1fNyJ,comment-id=000500010000,timestamp=2019-09-28T04:06:59.472+0000)
>
> Your a duumbfuck. Having bad games isnt punhsible. And this is the ONLY  game he jnted. Also anyone is allowed to take smite whenever the fuck they want. And on top of that i dont see where he isnt jungle taking it anyways. Stupidd r%%%%%

Lol good try trying to spell better so it doesnt look like you, but its still pretty obvious youre the same guy. You even said its the only game he inted. So you admit it was inting? Lol, not very clever. One game of inting DOES indeed get you a 14 day ban, so yeah, everything working as intended xD

Also, it wont be long till our posts are removed since youre now calling people names. Only a matter of time till mods remove it.

> [{quoted}](name=jchapman,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=vLF1fNyJ,comment-id=00050001000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-28T04:45:03.930+0000)
>
> Uhm no dumb dumb. That was me, and this is my alternate account,  how about use uour 5iq brain and see that my account is much higher rank and his is much lower and we play completelt different champs.
> 
> Nice try thoughand gj embarrassing yourself. I dont even care if it was removed for violating standards

Lmao thanks for admitting your friend was inting at least.

Yes, the first punishment for INTENTIONAL FEEDING is a 14-day suspension. It's not the same punishment levels that are used for chat-based offenses. Were you expecting a 10-game chat restriction for inting? Get out of here.
Must have bought your account, rejects dont get to that rank under their own steam

That was not "one game". 

Looking at your math history, you run down lane and feed _every_ game. Deserved, nothing of value was lost, and dont come back.
I watched the Yi and the Teemo games. He didn't int. He is just that bad. He is in the wrong elo. He should be somewhere between Iron 4 and Bronze 3, not Silver.

Why is your poll have the same option in it? Typo maybe?

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
then don't feed lol

I decided to watch two more of his games. I watched the Teemo and the Yi game and while I don't think he ran it down those games, holy fuck, he was bad. I know Silver is still low elo but Christ, he has some serious Iron level gameplay here. No way at all this dude should be in Silver. He is Bronze 3 at best. Silver players aren't this bad.
Silver is the same skill as gold and bronze,  and he plays buzzed half the time and just for for fun. He peaked plat 5 in season 6
Then why is he crying on the boards for then?

So just to clarify something. I got the real story irl for this game abd still think is ubfair even if i am his duo.

Basically this is the one and solo time he has ever inited. Singular. One time. Out of hundreds of games.

And the reason? He was so wasted he couldnt even walk. He drank to muxh rhat day due to some stressful life events and didnt even remember turning on league.

Now i know its easy for you to say its justified, but consider this -- this guy has 3 other perma banned accounts. All with a lot of nice legendary skins. He used to be toxic as all hell, and the game had no place for him. 

BUT he finally reformed, which a lot of people cannot do. He is a shining beautiful example that players can actually change. And the proof is in the honor. He hit that beautiful honor 3. Sonthing i can't even do becauss I'm toxic, and proud of it lol. 

This was first season he was gonna get rewards in 4 seasons, and its all thrown away now because he was to drunk to even remember feeding one game.


Riot has stated that before that one game shouldnt trigger a punishment, i know this for sure, it could probably be found somewhere. But he is banned spit on from one singular game. While there are clear examples of people feeding hundreds and never getting banned. And those arent even hard to findz they are on freaking YouTube.

My duo isnt the beat writer, so i felt it necessary to at least speak this on his part. Only reason he will even pkay anymore is because i want him to. Because riot truly does not care about there players. And they wont until you all stop spending money. I stopped and all i do is get free skins from hextech chests

Today at 12:47
Also I know I was afk for a short time my monther had me do somthing

So ur saying this kid was drunk. Lmfao yet he had to do something for his mom

Well he may have but turns out he didnt even remember the game, so just assumed he played poorly.  Like he was even surprised at video, and i believed he just did bad cause im used to carrying him lol
lol I watched the replay. He literally ran it down mid. He just walked into mid tower repeatedly for something like 10 minutes straight.
Can't say I'm sad about this. I'm just glad there's one less feeder in SoloQ that has a chance of getting on my team. If we could only ban all the other feeders I get daily, that would be great.

even if i am this evil person you people treat me as guess what im not... this is the first time i ever did this and guess what wheater i did it or not we would of lost and forthermore if i just went afk i wouldent of even got chat restricted... I have been honerable for 6 months to get honer 3 to get rewords for one fucking year... to lose it all over one game.. fuck this company and fuck you guys.. if you really think thats fair your idiots... all the feeders i get in my games who just afk jg and get away with it fine... punishment dosent fit the crime

> [{quoted}](name=Mythic Angol,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=vLF1fNyJ,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-09-28T04:42:35.276+0000)
>
> even if i am this evil person you people treat me as guess what im not... this is the first time i ever did this and guess what wheater i did it or not we would of lost and forthermore if i just went afk i wouldent of even got chat restricted... I have been honerable for 6 months to get honer 3 to get rewords for one fucking year... to lose it all over one game.. fuck this company and fuck you guys.. if you really think thats fair your idiots... all the feeders i get in my games who just afk jg and get away with it fine... punishment dosent fit the crime

Thing is, these people going afk in the jungle are actually smart, and at least try to hide it.
You just ran it down mid and ended the game with 2 cs, 18 deaths and moby's. Do you really expect the system to not catch you? Yes, we know it doesn't work but it's not blind.

It's actually not the first time you've done this. Apparently, you did it enough to get 22 reports over 20 games. That's an average of at least one report per game from someone. Sure, some of those are probably false reports - but you're trying to tell me that over half of them are?

> Just to let you know, when receiving a 2-week suspension; it is our way of giving the player a final warning. If you receive another intentional feeding suspension the account will be auto-escalated to a permaban. But if you want to avoid that, you can heal from your penalty by playing to your best ability with a neutral-positive mindset.

This isn't true, unless it has been changed, my housemate received multiple two week suspensions on his account whilst still at honour 0, nothing happened to him, literally the day he came off his two week ban for inting he got another one.
